title: Water Walking Potion
summaries: The Water Walking Potion is a buff potion which grants the Water Walking buff when consumed. The buff allows players to walk on water, honey, lava, and shimmer(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions). The player can sink in the liquid by pressing ▼ Down. This lasts for 10 minutes(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 5 minutes(Old-gen console and 3DS versions), but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon ([img:Desktop version]), by selecting the icon using Cycle Next/Previous Buff and then pressing Remove Buff ([img:Console version]), by selecting the icon and canceling it in the equipment menu ([img:Old-gen console version]), by double-tapping the buff icon ([img:Mobile version]), or by canceling the buff from the buffs screen ([img:Nintendo 3DS version]).

statistics.Tooltip: Allows the ability to walk on water
statistics.Sell: 2 SC
